sentence.Network_en: Parts of the administration may be changing but others have been obdurate defenders of the status quo.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府的一些部门可能正在作出改变，但是其他部门却执意维护现状。

sentence.Network_en: A third group were obdurate and still wanted to wait and see.
sentence.Network_cn: 第三部分人则是顽固地还要等着看.

sentence.Network_en: The child's misery would move even the most obdurate heart.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个孩子的悲惨遭遇即使最冷酷的心肠也会为之动情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... back,again 反向,再次 obdurate 冷酷,无情,执拗的 obey 服从,遵奉,顺从.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(O1)|无忧教育 ... obduracy 顽固 obdurate 执迷不悟的 obdurately 顽固地.
...法,由于 b,m 两个子音均是双唇音,极容易同化成一个音,obmit 遭到淘汰,只剩 omit 了.obdurate 冷酷,无情,执拗的obey 服从,遵奉,顺从

list.abs: the child's misery would move even the most obdurate heart .这个孩子的不幸甚至可以感动最冷酷的心。
He remained obdurate , refusing to alter his decision ., 他依然固执己见 , 拒不改变决定.
or , lord , if too obdurate i ., 主啊 , 我是否太执迷不悟.
Entrenched prejudices , obdurate opinions as sterile as no opinions at all ., 固有的偏见 , 执拗的观点与没有观点一样贫瘠可怜.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally in the sense 'hardened in sin, impenitent'): from Latin obduratus, past participle of obdurare, from ob- 'in opposition' + durare 'harden' (from durus 'hard')

entry.tran: 顽固不化的；倔强的；执拗的
entry.def: If you describe someone as obdurate, you think that they are being unreasonable in their refusal to change their decision or opinion.

example.ex: Parts of the administration may be changing but others have been obdurate defenders of the status quo.
example.tran: 政府的一些部门可能正在作出改变，但是其他部门却执意维护现状。

means.word_mean: 2. showing unfeeling resistance to tender feelings;

sentences.sentence: "the child's misery would move even the most obdurate heart"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dour=dur心硬不为所动→adj.冷酷的,严厉的
dur持久,延续,坚硬+able……的→adj.持久的,耐久的
ob加强+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate……的→加强硬→顽固
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ation表名词→n.持久;期间;持续时间
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ess表名词或动词→硬压→强迫
endure[v.忍受,持久,持续]+ance表名词→n.忍耐[力],持久[力],耐久[性]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在……的期间, 在……的时候
stems_affixes.word_buile: dur延续+ing状态→prep.在……的期间, 在……的时候
in进入+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate使……→使成为坚硬
per贯穿+dur持久+e→v.持久, 继续

sentences.en: obdurate conscience of the old sinner

means.word_mean: 麻木不仁的,冷酷无情的
